name: Falling In Space
description:
You all remember the classic graphing calculator game falling down, right?!

This is my spaced out version! 

Bet you can't break 100 points ;)

Developed by a dad, half an hour at a time, over the course of about a month.

Click "Support This Game" to show some love!

All feedback welcome.  If the game is a hit, I'll release it on iOS!
